main event: A witness reported sighting a bright red object in the sky over Cincinnati, Ohio on October 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to explode after moving away toward the west., The duration of the sighting was approximately 15 minutes., The witness described the object as similar to a hot air balloon despite inconsistent wind direction., Another UFO report was filed from Cincinnati around the same time., The witness indicated that the object was silent.
witness description: The witness was employed by the FBI in Cincinnati.
